title: Crime Alert 02.08.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 02.08.19
description:
Denise Williams masterminds her husband’s murder now get life behind bars. Crucial testimony in the murder of Shele Danishevsky comes from her hairdresser. 50-year-old fugitive wanted on child sex crimes get taken into custody wearing a “Father of the Year.”

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
